mixingRatio.description: This is a dictionary of the names of chemicals as keys and their molar fraction in the mixture as values

fraction.description: This is the type of fraction used in the mixingRatio. Currently 'molPerMol' or 'direct' are supported for this.

chemicals.description: This is a csv file specifying all the chemicals available in the system. This is supplied by the operator.

stockSolutions.description: This is a csv file specifying all the stock solutions supplied to the setup. This is supplied by the operator

measurement.description: This is a string specifying, which measurement is requested. It can either be 'densiVisco' or 'nmr'.
